script.name: MAE_ParticleEmitterSetParticlePosition(index,min,max)
script.func: real MADX9_ParticleEmitterSetParticlePos(real, real, real, real, real, real, real)
script.source:
var minVec = $min$, maxVec = $max$;
return external_call($MADX9_ParticleEmitterSetParticlePos$, $index$, minVec[0], minVec[1], minVec[2], maxVec[0], maxVec[1], maxVec[2]);

script.name: MAE_ParticleEmitterSetParticleAcceleration(index,acceleration)
script.source:
var acceleration = $acceleration$;
return external_call($MADX9_ParticleEmitterSetParticleAcc$, $index$, acceleration[0], acceleration[1], acceleration[2]);

script.name: MAE_ParticleEmitterSetParticleVelocity(index,min,max)
script.func: real MADX9_ParticleEmitterSetParticleVel(real, real, real, real, real, real, real)
script.source:
var minVec = $min$, maxVec = $max$;
return external_call($MADX9_ParticleEmitterSetParticleVel$, $index$, minVec[0], minVec[1], minVec[2], maxVec[0], maxVec[1], maxVec[2]);

script.name: MAE_ParticleEmitterSetParticleColour(index,rStart,gStart,bStart,aStart,rEnd,gEnd,bEnd,aEnd)
script.func: real MADX9_ParticleEmitterSetParticleCol(real, real, real, real, real, real, real, real, real)
